summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供配接器可以繼承自控制項的一般基底類別。The class provides a general base class from which control adapters can inherit. 這個類別提供的預設實作所需的所有介面卡的介面。This class provides a default implementation of the interface required for all adapters. 基底類別的預設呈現實作應該要呈現的所有子控制項。The default rendering implementation of the base class should be to render all child controls. 這可讓做為複合控制項配接器的基底類別。This allows the base class to be used as an adapter for composition controls.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會實作屬性介面，取得或設定要附加配接器的控制項。The property is an implementation of the property for the interface, which gets or sets the control to which the adapter is attached. 個別控制項配接器，您可以建立強型別的屬性，可隱藏屬性。For individual control adapters, you can create a strongly typed property to hide the property.

Public Overridable Sub CreateTemplatedUI (doDataBind As Boolean)
abstract member CreateTemplatedUI : bool -> unit override this.CreateTemplatedUI : bool -> unit

param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果為 ，執行個體化樣板便會繫結至可用的資料 (通常發生在第一次要求時)。

span.span: If , the instantiated templates bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果為 ，樣板不會繫結至資料，而是依賴檢視狀態將資料填入 (通常發生在後續回傳時)。

span.span: If , the templates do not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

summary.span: 由控制項呼叫，以建立樣板化使用者介面 (UI)。

span.span: Called by a control to create a templated user interface (UI).

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會呼叫方法的對應控制項配接器可以依次回呼的控制項方法，或建立自己的裝置特定樣板化 UI。The default implementation calls the method of the corresponding control adapter, which can in turn call back the control's method or create its own device-specific templated UI.

span.span: Name of the event.

summary.span: 如果已處理事件則傳回 。

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

returns.span: 如果事件已處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the event was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收回傳事件通知，檢查事件是否為配接器特定時，是由控制項呼叫這個方法。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific. 如果控制項實作方法，並接收回傳事件，呼叫方法的控制項配置器。If the control implements the method and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果傳送至控制項的事件可能會不同，視目標裝置而定，必須呼叫這個方法的控制項實作控制項配接器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 這個方法會傳回`true`或`false`，這表示裝置配接器是否處理事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 它會傳回`false`預設。It returns `false` by default.

related.span: 控制項和配接器的互動

value.span: 控制項中單一項目的大約權數。

span.span: The approximate weight of a single item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks -1 值表示，必須使用項目的預設權重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 繼承的類別必須覆寫這個屬性。The inheriting class must override this property. 如需覆寫這個屬性的進一步資訊，請參閱[分頁](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information about overriding this property, see [Pagination](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫此方法以設定裝置特有的屬性。You can override this method to set device-specific properties. 繼承的類別可以覆寫這個方法，以執行其他工作。Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks. 如果這個方法會覆寫繼承的類別中，您必須呼叫基底實作。If this method is overridden in an inheriting class, you must call the base implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用於表單重新編頁。This property is used for form pagination. -1 值表示，必須使用項目的預設權重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分頁](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information, see [Pagination](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).
